statements: UPDATE deforestation_biodiversity SET biodiversity_index = 6.8, deforestation_rate = 0.15 WHERE spatial_data = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)');
UPDATE deforestation_biodiversity SET deforestation_rate = 0.25, biodiversity_index = 5.2 WHERE spatial_data = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(2 2)');
UPDATE deforestation_biodiversity SET biodiversity_index = 0.8, deforestation_rate = 0.5 WHERE spatial_data = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)');
UPDATE deforestation_biodiversity SET deforestation_rate = 0.7, biodiversity_index = 0.6 WHERE spatial_data = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(2 2)');
UPDATE DeforestationEffects SET deforestation_area = 1500.25, region = 'Amazon' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SpatialData SET latitude = -3.789, longitude = -63.275, region = 'Africa' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE DeforestationEffects SET deforestation_area = 50000, biodiversity_index = 0.75 WHERE region = 'Amazon Rainforest';
UPDATE SpatialData SET latitude = -3.789, longitude = -73.652 WHERE id = 4;
UPDATE biodiversity_data SET threat_level = 'Extinct' WHERE species_name = 'Dodo';
UPDATE spatial_data SET location_name = 'Rainforest' WHERE area > 1000;
UPDATE biodiversity_data SET threat_level = 'High' WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE deforestation_data SET deforestation_rate = 2.5 WHERE region = 'Amazon';
UPDATE DeforestationEffects SET DeforestationArea = 200.5, BiodiversityImpact = 'High' WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE ForestRegions SET RegionArea = 1500.75, VegetationType = 'Tropical Rainforest' WHERE RegionName = 'Amazon'
UPDATE DeforestationEffects SET BiodiversityImpact='High', DeforestationArea = DeforestationArea + 500 WHERE ID=1;
UPDATE SpatialData SET Elevation = Elevation * 1.1, Latitude = 41.123456 WHERE LocationID=3;
UPDATE species_table SET species_name = 'Oak' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity_table SET biodiversity_index = 0.75 WHERE forest_id = 3;
UPDATE species_table SET species_name = 'Lion', species_category = 'Mammal', extinction_status = True WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE forest_table SET forest_area = 1500.75, forest_name = 'Rainforest' WHERE forest_id = 2;
